info.description:
This data set contains the list of polling places. It can be organized by ward/division, accessibility rating, or type of building.

This list is used to assign poll workers, send the machines and necessary accessibility materials, etc.

**Endpoint:** http://api.phila.gov/polling-places/v1
info.title: Polling Places API

200.description: An array containing the polling place

display_address.description: Mailing address of the polling place (formatted for display purposes).

division.description: The number of the electoral section that houses the polling place.

lat.description: Latitudinal coordinates of the polling place.

lng.description: Longitudinal coordinates of the polling place.

location.description: The name of the polling place.

pin_address.description: Mailing address of the polling place.

ward.description: The number of the electoral subdivision that houses the polling place.
